name: Power Sweep
description:
Grimdark ARPG about being a janitor. Sweep dust elementals and drop kickass legendary brooms so you can sweep more dust elementals.

(It's a joke about progression systems. Also a bad pun on "power creep". There isn't much to it.)

twitter

  • Background soundscape by Eric Matyas
